name: math_agent
description: An agent specialized in mathematics, capable of solving various mathematical problems including quadratic equations.
example_conversation_history:
User: Solve x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0
Agent: The roots are x = 2 and x = 3.

tools.name: solve_quadratic
tools.description: Calculates the roots of a quadratic equation ax^2 + bx + c = 0.
